snippet.title: KindFolx - Official Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description:
Learn more about the story, see gameplay, levels, and characters in this trailer for KindFolx, an upcoming deckbuilder action game. KindFolx will be available in Q3 2024, and a Kickstarter campaign is available now.


KindFolx, a city where Humankind and Monsterfolx live in peace has been taken over by a cruel Monsterfolk General and given birth to a new era of human oppression. Can you and the Adventurers Guild defeat Darlocke and the evil at the heart of the city in this real-time deckbuilder?
